User Sessions

The user study had 12 participants (7 males, 5 females, mean age 23). The UR5 robot guided users through a predefined trajectory demonstrated by the therapist. Users sat beside the robot, placed their hand on the desk. The robot guided their hand along the trajectory with speech instructions while users varied resistance arbitrarily.

For demonstrative therapy sessions collected from Spaulding Rehabilitation Center, see HERE.
